short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The best Adblocker. Blocks adblock detectors, malware, trackers on top of blocking ads on YouTube, Twitch, Facebook, and way more!
short.ro: Cel mai bun adblock care combate detectia si blocheaza reclamele de pe YouTube, Facebook, Twitch etc.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Best ad blocker ever. Adblock Detection? Blocked. Blocks trackers, malware (viruses), popups, video ads, cryptocurrency miners. Blocking ads on YouTube, Facebook, Hulu has never been easier!

Unlike other ad blockers, AdCrunch does not have an "acceptable ads" allowlist. We work for you and not for advertisers. Moreover, other ad blockers are easily detected whereas we are constantly working on implementing Stealth Blocking and many more solutions for combating such intrusive measures.

Save time, money, and your sanity.
